pageProduct.name: OGX Coconut Milk Conditioner 385ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Hair has a life of it's own and OGX wants to make sure it's a full life. Each innovative salon quality formula is made with on-trend ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, hold tight - whatever sets its personality free. The collections are fun and the choices never end.

In the world of haircare, no other brand has hair looking, smelling, and feeling like this. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS

General Information

OGX Coconut Milk Conditioner helps add strength, elasticity, hydration, and balance for healthy hair. The sulfate free conditioner uses a luxurious hydrating blend of coconut milk, coconut oil and egg white proteins to soften and moisturise the hair.

OGX Nourishing+ Coconut Milk Conditioner.
Why You Want It... It's like a trip to the tropics in a bottle. The luxuriously creamy, hydrating conditioner blend helps leave your hair feeling moisturized, glowing, and super soft.

Indulge your senses with this exclusive blend with coconut milk, coconut oil, and ultra whipped egg white proteins. This exotic coconut conditioner formula helps add strength, elasticity, hydration, and balance for healthy hair.


  • Moisturising conditioner with coconut milk, coconut oil and egg white proteins

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385mL

Shelf Life in Days: 912 days

KEY FEATURES

• Coconut Milk
• Nourishing Conditioner
• Adds Strength, Elasticity, Hydration & Balance


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Fragrance, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Sodium Benzoate, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-47, Albumen, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Sodium Hydroxide.

Directions

After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
